blogs.title: First Blog Post!
blogs.intro: Welcome to my very first blog post on my portfolio!
blogs.text1: This space is meant for showcasing smaller projects or personal musings that don't warrant a whole case study but are short and sweet. Writing can be a powerful tool for organizing one's thoughts, so hopefully, by writing down my reflections, I'll be able to untangle my mind a bit.
blogs.text2: In addition to project updates, I'll be sharing reflections on various topics related to design, technology, and anything else that interests me. Whether it's the latest trends in ux, emerging technologies, or cute animal pictures, I hope to provide some interesting and engaging content. This portfolio is my digital home and I hope you have fun exploring it. feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn or reach out over email
blogs.end: Stay tuned for more blog posts. I won't be keeping to any set schedule but will aim to write whenever I discover something new, interesting, or complete a new project. Thank you for taking the time to read my first blog post. Make sure to watch this space ðŸ˜Ž

blogs.title: Moo Deng Posting
blogs.intro: Moo Deng - The cutest Thai pygmy hippo from Khao Kheow Zoo!
blogs.text1: This 2-month old pygmy hippo has been all over my feed and I wanted to show this cutie to the masses.
blogs.end: I hope these pictures have lifted your spirits as much as they did mine.
